# Procedure — memo.create

(no new protocol intent).

Inputs

- Blocking question (player-safe), context (where/why), stakeholders, constraints.

Preconditions

- TU open; scope small; success criteria clear.

Process

1. Collect 2–5 relevant sources; summarize relevance neutrally.
2. Draft short_answer (decision-ready) and neutral_phrasing lines for surfaces.
3. Assign posture; note caveats; list risks_and_mitigations.
4. Write creative_implications per role; add done_checklist items.
5. Emit `tu.checkpoint`; deliver `research_memo` (Hot).

Outputs

- `research_memo` payload (Hot) and checkpoint; optional new hooks.

References

- 03-schemas/research_memo.schema.json; 00-north-star/SPOILER_HYGIENE.md
